subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Aside from his 45 points, the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony demonstrated a calm composure in the final minutes and showed why he is, arguably, the best scorer in the N.B.A.
snippet: Aside from his 45 points, the Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony demonstrated a calm composure in the final minutes and showed why he is, arguably, the best scorer in the N.B.A.
